mapper.select: SELECT ID_PERMISO_USUARIO AS ID_PERMISO_USUARIO, ID_PERFIL_REP_CAMPO AS ID_PERFIL_REP_CAMPO, ID_PERFIL_REP_USUARIO AS ID_PERFIL_REP_USUARIO, ID_USUARIO AS ID_USUARIO, USUARIO AS USUARIO, ID_PERFIL AS ID_PERFIL, PERFIL AS PERFIL, ID_TABLA AS ID_TABLA, TABLA AS TABLA, ID_CAMPO AS ID_CAMPO, CAMPO AS CAMPO, VER_TRUNCADO AS VER_TRUNCADO FROM VIE_MAN_REP_PERMISO_USUARIO
